Command line interface for grogupy

This module does not contain functions, but provides a command line interface for grogupy. It loads the input parameters from a Python file and runs the simulation or makes analysis.

Scripts

run

analyze

check_convergence

Examples

For examples, see the running in HPC section in the documentation.
